mapper.sql: sr_id, parent_sr_id, resource_type, auth_type, resource_code, resource_name, url, component, description, icon, priority, is_check, is_admin, is_available, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, is_deleted
mapper.insert: insert into sys_resource (sr_id, parent_sr_id, resource_type, auth_type, resource_code, resource_name, url, component, description, icon, priority, is_check, is_admin, is_available, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, is_deleted) values (#{srId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parentSrId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{resourceType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{authType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{resourceCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{resourceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{component,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{priority,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isCheck,jdbcType=BIT}, #{isAdmin,jdbcType=BIT}, #{isAvailable,jdbcType=BIT}, #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{isDeleted,jdbcType=BIT})

mapper.update:
update sys_resource
parent_sr_id = #{parentSrId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
resource_type = #{resourceType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
auth_type = #{authType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
resource_code = #{resourceCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
resource_name = #{resourceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
url = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
component = #{component,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
icon = #{icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
priority = #{priority,jdbcType=INTEGER},
is_check = #{isCheck,jdbcType=BIT},
is_admin = #{isAdmin,jdbcType=BIT},
is_available = #{isAvailable,jdbcType=BIT},
create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
is_deleted = #{isDeleted,jdbcType=BIT},
where sr_id = #{srId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update sys_resource set parent_sr_id = #{parentSrId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, resource_type = #{resourceType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, auth_type = #{authType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, resource_code = #{resourceCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, resource_name = #{resourceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, url = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, component = #{component,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, icon = #{icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, priority = #{priority,jdbcType=INTEGER}, is_check = #{isCheck,jdbcType=BIT}, is_admin = #{isAdmin,jdbcType=BIT}, is_available = #{isAvailable,jdbcType=BIT}, create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, is_deleted = #{isDeleted,jdbcType=BIT} where sr_id = #{srId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select sr.sr_id, sr.parent_sr_id, sr.resource_type, sr.auth_type, sr.resource_code, sr.resource_name, sr.url, sr.component, sr.description, sr.icon, sr.priority, sr.is_check, sr.is_admin, sr.is_available, sr.create_by, sr.create_time, sr.update_by, sr.update_time, sr.is_deleted from sys_resource sr where sr.is_deleted = '0' and sr.is_available = '1' and sr.is_admin = '1' and sr.resource_type = 'RESOURCE_TYPE_MENU' order by priority

select distinct sr.sr_id, sr.parent_sr_id, sr.resource_type, sr.auth_type, sr.resource_code, sr.resource_name, sr.url, sr.component, sr.description, sr.icon, sr.priority, sr.is_check, sr.is_admin, sr.is_available, sr.create_by, sr.create_time, sr.update_by, sr.update_time, sr.is_deleted from sys_user_role sur left outer join sys_role_resource srr on sur.role_id = srr.role_id left outer join sys_resource sr on srr.resource_id = sr.sr_id where sr.is_deleted = '0' and sr.is_available = '1' and sr.resource_type = 'RESOURCE_TYPE_MENU' and sur.user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by priority
